metadata.title: CVE-2023-6200 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux Kernel. Under certain conditions,an unauthenticated attacker from an adjacent network could send an ICMPv6router advertisement packet, causing arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
